text: know how all week I've been sharing some
preserving ideas with you well today I'm
gonna give you a recipe of what to do
with one of those ideas the jam I'm
gonna make a really really easy hand pie
I'm starting off with one box or about
17 ounces of puff pastry it's been
defrosted in the refrigerator and I'm
rolling it to an eighth of an inch which
basically it already is cut the pastry
into four squares place a heaping
tablespoon of jam off-center on each
square may not look like a lot right now
but I assure you that it will be plenty
of delicious jam as it bakes with one
large egg yolk to make an egg wash and
brush the edges of your pastry fold the
pastry over to enclose the jam and then
you press to seal you can use a fork if
you'd like to make a decorative edge and
I do like so I'm going to want to make
sure that they're nicely sealed so that
the jam doesn't seep out while they're
cooking and the egg helps make sure
there's a really nice solid seal as does
pressing it down with your fork put
these on a parchment lined baking sheet
freeze these for 30 minutes while
they're freezing preheat the oven to 375
and then bake them until they're golden
20 to 25 minutes once the pies come out
of the oven you want to let them cool
completely which I'm doing here and I'm
gonna make a little lemon confectioner
sugar glaze to go on them I have 1/3 of
a cup of confectioner's sugar in this
bowl and to that I'm adding one
tablespoon of lemon juice
I like to start with a little less than
the tablespoon I'm always nervous that
it's gonna be too much liquid and my
glaze is gonna be too thin but that's
not so I'm gonna add a little more look
at that and it's nice and tangy a great
contrast to the sweetness and the
filling still sweet to spoon your glaze
over your pies I don't really like a
drizzle so I'm gonna do smooth but you
can drizzle if you like that and then
you do kind of have to let it set I mean
otherwise it'll be gooey you can eat it
right away
or you can let it set for about 15-20
minutes I have these set on a rimmed
baking sheet on a wire rack so they
don't make a mess it's a 5-ingredient
treat me with your own homemade jam but
obviously if you want to make it even
easier use store-bought I said I wasn't
gonna try them because they weren't set
yet but I am gonna try cuz I want to
taste them mmm very delicious very messy
right now for the blazing stove I'm I
don't care
don't talk with your mouth full Sarah hi
guys thanks for watching this video be
sure to click here if you want to
subscribe and click over here if you
